onap.policies.Monitoring.name: onap.policies.Monitoring
onap.policies.Monitoring.description: a base policy type for all policies that govern monitoring provisioning

onap.policies.Sirisha.name: onap.policies.Sirisha
onap.policies.Sirisha.description: a base policy type for all policies that govern monitoring provisioning

onap.policies.controlloop.operational.Co.name: onap.policies.controlloop.operational.Common
onap.policies.controlloop.operational.Co.description:
Operational Policy for Control Loop execution. Originated in Frankfurt to support TOSCA Compliant
Policy Types. This does NOT support the legacy Policy YAML policy type.

abatement.name: abatement
abatement.description: Whether an abatement event message will be expected for the control loop from DCAE.

operations.name: operations
operations.description: List of operations to be performed when Control Loop is triggered.

trigger.name: trigger
trigger.description: Initial operation to execute upon receiving an Onset event message for the Control Loop.

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description:
Overall timeout for executing all the operations. This timeout should equal or exceed the total
timeout for each operation listed.

engineServiceParameters.name: engineServiceParameters
engineServiceParameters.description: The engine parameters like name, instanceCount, policy implementation, parameters etc.

javaProperties.name: javaProperties
javaProperties.description: Name/value pairs of properties to be set for APEX if needed.

elements.name: elements
elements.description: Specifies a list of control loop element definitions that make up this control loop definition

provider.name: provider
provider.description: Specifies the organization that provides the control loop element

runningToPassiveTimeout.name: runningToPassiveTimeout
runningToPassiveTimeout.description: The maximum time in seconds to wait for a state chage from running to passive

participantType.name: participantType
participantType.description: The identity of the participant type that hosts this type of Control Loop Element

provider.name: provider
provider.description: Specifies the organization that provides the control loop element

startPhase.name: startPhase
startPhase.description: A value indicating the start phase in which this control loop element will be started, the first start phase is zero. Control Loop Elements are started in their start_phase order and stopped in reverse start phase order. Control Loop Elements with the same start phase are started and stopped simultaneously

passiveToUninitializedTimeout.name: passiveToUninitializedTimeout
passiveToUninitializedTimeout.description: The maximum time in seconds to wait for a state chage from passive to uninitialized

uninitializedToPassiveTimeout.name: uninitializedToPassiveTimeout
uninitializedToPassiveTimeout.description: The maximum time in seconds to wait for a state chage from uninitialized to passive

passiveToRunningTimeout.name: passiveToRunningTimeout
passiveToRunningTimeout.description: The maximum time in seconds to wait for a state chage from passive to running

httpHeaders.name: httpHeaders
httpHeaders.description: HTTP headers to send on REST requests

baseUrl.name: baseUrl
baseUrl.description: The base URL to be prepended to each path, identifies the host for the REST endpoints.

configurationEntities.name: configurationEntities
configurationEntities.description: The connfiguration entities the Control Loop Element is managing and their associated REST requests

org.onap.domain.pmsh.PMSH_MonitoringPoli.description: Control loop element for the monitoring policy for Performance Management Subscription Handling

org.onap.domain.pmsh.DerivedDerivedPolic.description: Control loop for Performance Management Subscription Handling

org.onap.domain.database.PMSH_K8SMicrose.name: org.onap.domain.database.PMSH_K8SMicroserviceControlLoopElement
org.onap.domain.database.PMSH_K8SMicrose.description: Control loop element for the K8S microservice for PMSH

org.onap.domain.pmsh.DerivedPolicyContro.description: Control loop for Performance Management Subscription Handling

payload.name: payload
payload.description: Name/value pairs of payload information passed by Policy to the actor

target.name: target
target.description: The resource the operation should be performed on.

operation.name: operation
operation.description: The operation the actor is performing.

onap.datatype.controlloop.Operation.name: onap.datatype.controlloop.Operation
onap.datatype.controlloop.Operation.description: An operation supported by an actor

failure_retries.name: failure_retries
failure_retries.description: Points to the operation to invoke when the current operation has exceeded its max retries.

failure_timeout.name: failure_timeout
failure_timeout.description: Points to the operation to invoke when the time out for the operation occurs.

failure.name: failure
failure.description: Points to the operation to invoke on Actor operation failure.

operation.name: operation
operation.description: The definition of the operation to be performed.

failure_guard.name: failure_guard
failure_guard.description: Points to the operation to invoke when the current operation is blocked due to guard policy enforcement.

retries.name: retries
retries.description: The number of retries the actor should attempt to perform the operation.

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: The amount of time for the actor to perform the operation.

failure_exception.name: failure_exception
failure_exception.description: Points to the operation to invoke when the current operation causes an exception.

description.name: description
description.description: A user-friendly description of the intent for the operation

success.name: success
success.description: Points to the operation to invoke on success. A value of "final_success" indicates and end to the operation.

onap.datatype.controlloop.Target.name: onap.datatype.controlloop.Target
onap.datatype.controlloop.Target.description: Definition for a entity in A&AI to perform a control loop operation on

entityIds.name: entityIds
entityIds.description:
Map of values that identify the resource. If none are provided, it is assumed that the
entity that generated the ONSET event will be the target.

managedObjectDNsBasic.name: managedObjectDNsBasic
managedObjectDNsBasic.description: List of managed object distinguished names

body.name: body
body.description: The body of the REST request for PUT and POST requests

expectedResponse.name: expectedResponse
expectedResponse.description: THe expected HTTP status code for the REST request

restRequestId.name: restRequestId
restRequestId.description: The name and version of a REST request to be sent to a REST endpoint

path.name: path
path.description: The path of the REST request relative to the base URL
